exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language n' : nat t : fol.Term L ts' : fol.Terms L n' m1, m2 : nat -> fol.Term L H : forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerms L (S n') (Tcons L n' t ts')) -> m1 m = m2 m IHts' : (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerms L n' ts') -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerms n' ts' m1 = subAllTerms n' ts' m2 Unable to unify "subAllTerm ?M1441 ?M1442 = subAllTerm ?M1441 ?M1443" with "Tcons L n' (subAllTerm t m1) (subAllTerms n' ts' m1) = Tcons L n' (subAllTerm t m2) (subAllTerms n' ts' m1)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerms n ts m1 = subAllTerms n ts m2

Premises:
freeVarTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> list nat
subAllTerms : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation Terms := (fol.Terms L)
subAllTerm_ext : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerm L t) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerm t m1 = subAllTerm t m2
subTermsNil : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> substituteTerms L n ts v s = ts
subAllTerm = fix subAllTerm (t : fol.Term L) : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Term L := match t with | @fol.var _ x => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => m x | @fol.apply _ f ts => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => fol.apply L f (subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts m) end with subAllTerms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) {struct ts} : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return ((nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => fun _ : nat -> fol.Term L => Tnil L | @Tcons _ n' t ss => fun m : nat ->...-> fol.Term L Arguments subAllTerm _ _%function_scope
freeVarSubTerms4 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n ts)
freeVarSubTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
subTermsTrans : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerms L n ts)) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerms L n ts v1 s
freeVarSubTerms3 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerms L n ts)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subTermsExch : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 s1
subSubTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 (substituteTerm L s1 v2 s2)
plus_n_Sm : forall n m : nat, S (n + m) = n + S m
subTermsId : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat), substituteTerms L n ts v (fol.var L v) = ts
le_lt_or_eq : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> n < m \/ n = m
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.lt_le_incl : forall n m : nat, n < m -> n <= m
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
le_lt_n_Sm : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> n < S m
gt_le_S : forall n m : nat, m > n -> S n <= m
Nat.le_lt_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p
gt = fun n m : nat => m < n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gt (_ _)%nat_scope
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t

```coq
intros n ts m1 m2 H.
induction ts as [|n' t ts' IHts'].
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHts'. apply subAllTerm_ext. intros m Hm. apply H.
Qed.```

original: intros n ts m1 m2 H. induction ts as [|n' t ts' IHts']. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite <- IHts'. apply subAllTerm_ext. intros m Hm. apply H.
